description: RQ1 contains additional detail for each nonstock requisitioned item. This segment definition is paired with a preceeding RQD segment.

1.name: Anticipated Price
1.description: reference price for the requisition unit of measure that is known to the Requisition application. It may or may not be the actual cost of acquiring the item from a supplier. It is also not the price charged to the patient

2.name: Manufacturer Id
2.description: unique code that identifies the manufacturer on the application receiving the requisition. Codes may be selected from HIBCC Manufacturer's Labeler ID Code (LIC), the UPC or the NDC.

3.name: Manufacturer's Catalog
3.description: manufacturer's catalog number or code for this item

4.name: Vendor Id
4.description: unique code that identifies the vendor on the application receiving the requisition

5.name: Vendor Catalog
5.description: vendor's catalog number, name, or code for this item

6.name: Taxable
6.description: is this item subject to tax?

7.name: Substitute Allowed
7.description: indicates whether the ancillary department may substitute an equivalent version of the item(s) ordered. Refer to table 0136 - Y/N indicator
